column1: The  Petitioners  in  one  paragraph  have  merely  pleaded  that  they  were  aware  of  an
Association that has filed a Fundamental Rights Application. The Petitioners’ silence
on  the  Respondents’  allegation  that  some  of  the  Petitioners  were  parties  to  the  said
Fundamental Rights Application also does not help them in convincing this Court of
their inability to disclose material facts. Hence, in my view, the objection raised by the
Respondents on suppression of facts has to succeed.
